title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 2266/88 of 19 July 1988 fixing the basic price and the standard quality for slaughtered pigs for the period 1 July 1988 to 31 October 1989
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 2266/88 of 19 July 1988 fixing the basic price and the standard quality for slaughtered pigs for the period 1 July 1988 to 31 October 1989
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1.  For the period 1 November 1988 to 31 October 1989 the basic price for slaughtered pigs of the standard quality shall be 2 033,30 ECU per tonne.
2.  By way of derogation from Article 4 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 2759/75, the price provided for in paragraph 1 above shall apply from 1 July 1988 to 31 October 1989.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 July 1988.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
